title: Generating Sentences from Semantic Vector Space Representations
abstract: The first work of this kind in a monolingual setting successfully generates two and threeword phrases with predetermined syntactic structures by decoupling the task into three phases: synthesis, decomposition, and search [4]. During the synthesis phase, a vector is constructed from some input text. This vector is decomposed into multiple output vectors that are then matched to words in the vocabulary using a nearest-neighbor search.
